reactor.tcp

Interface TcpConnection.ConsumerSpec<IN,OUT>

  • Type Parameters:
    IN - type of the input
    OUT - type of the output
    Enclosing interface:
    TcpConnection<IN,OUT>

    public static interface TcpConnection.ConsumerSpec<IN,OUT>
    Spec class for assigning multiple event handlers on a connection.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      TcpConnection.ConsumerSpec close(java.lang.Runnable onClose)
      Assign a Runnable to be invoked when the connection is closed.
      TcpConnection.ConsumerSpec readIdle(long idleTimeout, java.lang.Runnable onReadIdle)
      Assign a Runnable to be invoked when reads have become idle for the given timeout.
      TcpConnection.ConsumerSpec writeIdle(long idleTimeout, java.lang.Runnable onWriteIdle)
      Assign a Runnable to be invoked when writes have become idle for the given timeout.

    • Method Detail

      • close

        TcpConnection.ConsumerSpec close(java.lang.Runnable onClose)
        Assign a Runnable to be invoked when the connection is closed.
        Parameters:
        onClose - the close event handler
        Returns:
        this

      • readIdle

        TcpConnection.ConsumerSpec readIdle(long idleTimeout,
                                  java.lang.Runnable onReadIdle)
        Assign a Runnable to be invoked when reads have become idle for the given timeout.
        Parameters:
        idleTimeout - the idle timeout
        onReadIdle - the idle timeout handler
        Returns:
        this

      • writeIdle

        TcpConnection.ConsumerSpec writeIdle(long idleTimeout,
                                   java.lang.Runnable onWriteIdle)
        Assign a Runnable to be invoked when writes have become idle for the given timeout.
        Parameters:
        idleTimeout - the idle timeout
        onWriteIdle - the idle timeout handler
